mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) AS RN, BOARD_NO,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,CREATE_DATE,READ_COUNT, BOARD_ST,USER_NO,BOARD_LIKE,BOARD_TAG,USER_NICK FROM BOARD JOIN "USER" USING(USER_NO) ) A WHERE RN > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
